WhatsIncludedSection.title: The best cloud storage lifetime deals for full privacy online
WhatsIncludedSection.description: Internxt protects your privacy rather than profits from it. Get the ultimate protection for your data online with secure cloud storage and more.

descriptions:
Internxt Drive comes with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption, so nobody but you can access your files. Get encrypted cloud storage and backups for your photos, videos, and files.

Plus, encrypted backups and password-protected file sharing offer maximum protection against ransomware and data breaches.

All paid plans also include Internxt Antivirus for increased protection against the increasing threats we face online.

Run full or custom scans from the Internxt app to defend against malware, phishing, and ransomware, and clean and protect your device from data loss or breaches.

Get our ultra-fast, unlimited VPN for up to 5 locations to encrypt and secure your connection with our private VPN.

Encrypt your traffic to prevent external spying on your connection in public spaces, bypass geographic restrictions, and prevent data leaks. Internxt VPN provides total privacy when surfing online.

Internxt Cleaner boosts your device performance and health by removing junk or duplicate files from your computer.

Free up storage, improve device speeds, and protect your privacy by deleting unwanted files with a click of a button.

Internxt Meet offers fully private video calls powered by post-quantum cryptography, ensuring your meetings are secure, confidential, and free from trackers.

Host and join video calls with friends, family, or teammates in complete privacy, free from external companies monitoring your chats.

Draft, send, and receive emails with Internxt Mail, a fully encrypted and private email to ensure nobody but you and your contacts can view your messages.

With Internxt Mail, we guarantee that nobody but you can access your messages or attachments, which are all secured with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption.

Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile, Internxt lets you take total control of your cloud storage by accessing your cloud from anywhere, on any device.

For advanced users, Internxt offers support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS, offering everything you need to manage your files in total privacy.

WhyChooseInternxtSection.title: Why choose Internxt's lifetime plans?
WhyChooseInternxtSection.description: Our lifetime cloud storage deals give you back control of your privacy. Unlike traditional cloud storage, we ensure only you have the keys to your encrypted data, and we don't store or sell your data to third parties. We take every step to ensure your information remains secure.

descriptions: Say goodbye to subscription models and unpredictable renewal costs with our cloud storage lifetime deals. With one payment, you can access your storage and features forever with no more payments needed.

We don't store passwords or user data, and all of your data is encrypted in transit and at rest with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.
Internxt is the only cloud storage that automatically encrypts your files using end-to-end and post-quantum cryptography, meaning only you can access your data.
We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

CtaSectionV2.title: Full privacy for {{percentage}}% off
CtaSectionV2.description: Get the deal of a lifetime with Internxt

faq.question: Who can claim these cloud storage lifetime deals?
answer: These Internxt deals are for new customers or customers with a free account, or customers who wish to upgrade their current lifetime plan for 87% off to get access to our new features.

faq.question: Can I use an Internxt deal if I already have a lifetime plan?
answer: If you currently have a lifetime plan and wish to stack storage to your current account and access the features of a Premium or Ultimate plan, you can use this deal to upgrade your account.

faq.question: What happens when my deal expires?
answer: If you buy an annual plan with your Internxt deal, this applies to the first year only. Once your first year expires, your plan will automatically renew at the full price listed on our pricing section.
If you want to avoid subscription charges, you can purchase a lifetime plan for a one-time payment and never pay again, unless you choose to upgrade your storage.

faq.question: How can I upgrade or add more storage later?
answer: If you have a lifetime plan, you can stack or upgrade your plan anytime to get more storage. It is not possible to upgrade or add more storage for annual plans. Keep an eye out on our website for the latest coupon codes and offers.

faq.question: Can I pay with a credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc.). You can also pay through PayPal, cryptocurrency, or split the payment of your lifetime plan with Klarna.
If you have questions about payment methods, simply email us at hello@internxt.com

faq.question: Can I split my lifetime payment?
answer: Yes, you can now split your lifetime payments into multiple interest-free installments using Klarna. Enjoy a lifetime plan with the ease of paying for it in easy installments!

faq.question: What is Internxt's refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
And if you're ever unsatisfied with our service, contact us at hello@internxt.com and request a refund.

faq.question: How can I contact support?
answer: Can't find what you're looking for? You can contact our technical support team through live chat or by emailing hello@internxt.com
